metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3153 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Open Virtual Network where the service monitor MAC does not properly rate limit. This issue could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service, including on deployments with CoPP enabled and properly configured.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovn-central - 23.09.0-1
ovn-common - 23.09.0-1
ovn-controller-vtep - 23.09.0-1
ovn-host - 23.09.0-1
ovn-ic - 23.09.0-1
ovn-ic-db - 23.09.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ovn package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '23.09.0-1').
